title: Apply Online Today and Move-in right away to a 2-bedroom, 1-bath
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 866 Sq.
Every apartment at Panomar offers the space and comforting qualities you need to make your apartment the home you’ve always desired.
Our modern 1, 2, and 3 Bedroom apartments give you the ability to choose from a variety of floor plans that will surely meet your highest expectations.
The amenities offered at Panomar provide residents with all the necessities of easy living and floor plans for every lifestyle.

Carpeting in Bedrooms, Plank Flooring in Living Areas, Fully Tiled Bathrooms, Stainless Steel Appliances - Microwave, Refrigerator, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Cable Ready, Heating, Private Balcony, Window Coverings, Roof Top Sky Deck Views - Downtown Oakland and San Francisco Skyline, Full Size Washer Dryer
In every Apartment, Walk In Closets depending on floor plan

Smoke-Free Community, Elevators, Controlled Access, One, Two, and Three Bedroom Apartment Homes, Professional Management, BBQ grill, Professional Landscaping, 24 hr Emergency Maintenance Service, Business Center, Fitness Center, Resident Lounge, Great Neighborhood, Close to Shopping, Dining, Bus Routes and Much, High Speed Internet Access, Rooftop Sky Deck, Package Acceptance At The Office, Flexible Lease Terms Available
Inquire for details regarding our policies!
